Headline: Harlem-bound Green & 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains bypassing Morgan/Lake Station
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green & 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morgan/Lake due to a defective station entrance door.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green & 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morgan/Lake due to a defective station entrance door.

  • For Harlem-bound Green or 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line train service to these stations, take a Harlem-bound Green or 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line train to Ashland/Lake and transfer to 63rd-bound Green or Loop-bound Pink Line train.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays at Damen
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to Fire Department Activity at Damen; board all trains on the O'Hare-bound side between Western and Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays due to Fire Department Activity at Damen; board all trains on the O'Hare-bound side at Damen.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Western and Damen stations..

Board/exit all trains on the O'Hare-bound side of the platform between Western and Damen stations.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
